project_plan.name: Temperature Conversion Command-Line Tool
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line tool that converts temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin based on user input.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion from Celsius to Fahrenheit and Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion from Fahrenheit to Celsius and Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion from Kelvin to Celsius and Fahrenheit
Create user interface for input and output
Write tests for each conversion feature to ensure accuracy
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
